title: Me de Shireru Yoru no Junjou
sinopse:
In Yoshiwara (present-day Tokyo during the Edo Period), prostitution was abolished and brothels were restored in the red light district. We meet Kichou and his "princess" who are the top courtesans of the Men's Brothel Quarters at Hanafurirou....
(Source: The Evil Empire)

Series composed of:
Vol.1 Toku Hen (禿偏)
Vol.2 Keisei Hen (傾城編)
Vol.3 Hanazono Hen (華園編)
